pullrequest.title: DetachJoint: try to restore BodyNodes to original skeleton

content.raw: Since "/" is not a reserved character, we can assume that a link could have a "/" in its name. If we tried to detach a joint that was created during initial construction of a model (i.e, without calling `AttachFixedJoint`), then it would incorrectly try to modify the name a link. Is there a way we can limit this name modification to joints that were attached by calling `AttachFixedJoint`?
